amendatorysection.para: Creditors having a specific or general lien upon all or any portion of the property may or may not be made parties, at the option of the plaintiff.

annotation.para: Plaintiff in partition suit may at his option make holder of tax lien a party to the suit. Fairley v. Kemper, 174 Neb. 565, 118 N.W.2d 754 (1962).
Creditor having a specific or a general lien upon property being partitioned may or may not be made a party at the option of the plaintiff. Majerus v. Santo, 143 Neb. 774, 10 N.W.2d 608 (1943).
